text:
This is probably the most basic question to ask that could ever exist, but how do I use the developer tools?
I just want to modify the margin of items, and potentially give them id's/classes for css files

<https://i.imgur.com/HzewTQg.png>
Not sure if this is the correct channel but I'm wondering if there is any way to add an ID to a flexible column on a page. Any advice would be greatly appreciated.
